## About this app
 _arrow_forward_
Record Book is a **Free CRM, Digital Register, Udhaar Register, Register Book, khata register, GST register, attendance register.** It helps you replace all your traditional Register book, bahi-khata book, attendance book, cash book, bookkeeping, memo, notes and salary book. It is India's best **EXCEL ON MOBILE, Digital Register App & CRM on Mobile.** A 100% secure and auto data-backed up CRM spreadsheet mobile app for all types of businesses and Teams to maintain their daily records on mobile. Businesses owners and teams can use this as a bookkeeping app, salary book, or attendance app and work with their staff to keep themselves updated real-time.‚úÖ **Guaranteed 100% Data Safety** - All data linked to your phone number and can be accessed from any mobile only after enter the OTP. Auto backup feature keeps you worry free of losing your important business or personal data. Keep managing your data without any worry.‚úÖ **28 Data Types** - You can manage phone numbers, photos, videos, audios, files and many more. Freedom to create dropdown and custom status, makes the project management or task management easy on the phone.‚úÖ **Unlimited Registers** - All the freedom to manage your data. Create as many registers as you feel need of it. Folders option let you manage all your different registers for different use or department.‚úÖ **Share Your Register in 1-Click** - Easily share your digital Register Book, or list with your staff to let them add daily transaction, update to-do list and more through mobile.‚úÖ **Register Templates for Every Business** - Premade digital register templates are already here for every business and use case. Use it to manage your construction business, school, real estate or transport book.‚úÖ **Registers: Capable for Everything** - Easily create your Register Book, Add unlimited columns. edit column name & data types. Add any file in your register to manage photos, videos, or audios to manage your daily task, to do list or ongoing projects.‚úÖ **CSV and PDF Report Creator** - Easily generate reports from your digital Register Books and export in the excel format & PDF. Positioned within the **fintech**, **SaaS**, and **B2B** sectors, RecordBook primarily targets SMBs looking for efficient management solutions that maximize their operations while minimizing the need for extensive technical knowledge.

**Why It Matters**  
For many small businesses, data management can be a cumbersome task, bogged down by outdated methods that do not fit the fast-paced digital world. RecordBook cuts through that complexity with a solution that is not only user-friendly but also designed to grow alongside its users.
